name: Protect the Magic Tree
description:
Protect the Magic Tree is a tower-defense like game where you must protect a magic tree by planting flowers (and a Bug Zapper?) to ward off pests. Prevent them from killing your tree!

Protect the Magic Tree is my entry into the #GoGodotJam game jam. It is also my first game jam entry.

Currently included in build:

  • 3 plantable defenses
  • 3 enemies
  • 5 levels spanning in difficulty
  • Fully working menus

Controls

  • [ESC] pauses and resumes the game
  • [E] toggles the UI on/off
  • [Left-Click] the defense's icon to activate planting mode and [Right-Click] to exit planting mode without planting

All assets are self-created except for the Baby Party font.
